panels.description: Whether the node is running against mainnet or not.
panels.title: Mainnet

panels.description: Whether the node is fully in sync with the network or not.
panels.title: Synchronized

panels.description: For how long this node has been up.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Size of node's database on disk.
panels.title: Database Size

panels.description: Amount of free space in the partition where the node's database is located at.
panels.title: Free space

panels.description: Total amount of data sent and received by this node.
panels.title: Data Transfer

panels.description: Current chain's block height vs node's current height. When syncing, let's one quickly tell how far the node is from being synchronized with the network.
panels.title: Height and Target

panels.description: Node's current height
panels.title: Height

panels.description: For how long this node has been up.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Size of node's database on disk.
panels.title: Database Size

panels.description: The distribution of the heights of our peers
panels.title: Connected Peers' Height

panels.description: Total amount of data sent and received by this node.
panels.title: Data Transfer

panels.description: Amount of free space in the partition where the node's database is located at.
panels.title: Free space

panels.description: The distribution of data retrieval from our connected peers.
panels.title: P2P Peers Data In Rate

panels.description: Rate of data transmission in and out from this node (p2p and rpc).
panels.title: Data rate

panels.description: The distribution of data transmission to our connected peers.
panels.title: P2P Peers Data Out Rate

panels.description:
Average amount of time spent serving RPC methods over that past minute.

ps.: this includes the calls made by the stats collector too.
panels.title: Time spent serving RPC methods

panels.description:
Average number of RPC requests served over the past interval.

ps.: this includes the calls made by the stats collector too.
panels.title: RPC hits per Interval

panels.description: Number of transactions in the transaction pool (mempool).
panels.title: Mempool Transactions (2m)

panels.description: Total size of the transaction pool (mempool)
panels.title: Mempool Bytes

panels.description: Total amount of fees for the transactions in the transaction pool.
panels.title: Mempool Fees (2m)

panels.description: Difficulty used for mining the last block
panels.title: Mining Difficulty

panels.description: Total block rewards granted to the miner of this block (transaction fees + block subsidy).
panels.title: Mining Rewards

panels.description: Sum of inputs and outputs used in the last block's transactions.
panels.title: Inputs and Outputs

panels.description: Number of peers in each peer list.
panels.title: Peerlists' count

panels.description: A couple of statistics that reveals weird scenarios found in the transaction pool.
panels.title: Weird cases

panels.description: Total size of the block
panels.title: Block Size

panels.description: Number of RPC connections being served.
panels.title: RPC Connections

panels.description: The distribution of the age of the connections established to/from our nodes.
panels.title: Connections' Age

panels.description: Number of connections based on their connection state.
panels.title: Connections by connection state
